Ex-chemist allegedly mixed drug samples with cocaine

Annie Dookhan, appearing at a bail hearing after her arrest today, also admitted she would grab a pile of 25 samples, test about five, and then list them all as positive, a prosecutor said in court. (Boston Globe)

Oktoberfest 2012

More than 6 million people are expected to attend the 179th Oktoberfest in Munich. Known as the world's largest beer festival, the event dates back to 1810.
